name: Minion Beanie and Diaper Cover with Suspenders
Scarecrow Hat Patterns
description:
These Scarecrow hats are perfect for Fall, and make fantastic hat-costumes for photography shoots!
- Great for everyday wear, as a gift or as a photography prop. - This pattern is available in both US and UK Terms. 


{ P A T T E R N - I N F O }
- There are 2 patterns (in both US and UK terms): 
- One is a Scarecrow with a Bowler hat that is stitched on afterwards;
- The other is a Scarecrow with a hat all made in one piece (not stitched together)
- Instructions for a Scarecrow hat 7 sizes, from Newborn to Large Adult;
- Scarecrow Bowler hat (for the 2-piece version)
- Nose; eyes, mouth, patches, sunflower and and hay-hair fringe;
- This pattern is suitable for an experienced beginner (familiar with basic stitches).


 { M A T E R I A L S - N E E D E D }
- #4 (worsted / medium weight / 10-ply) yarn
(The amount needed depends on the style and size of hat you are making).
- G (4mm), H (5mm), I (5.5mm) Crochet Hooks
